definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The level of calcification was positive correlation with time of clinical symptom.
sentences.chinese: 钙化的轻重与临床表现出现的早晚成正相关。

sentences.english: There is an area of bone destruction accompanied by partial calcification, with no periosteal reactive new bone.
sentences.chinese: 骨组织局部破坏并伴有钙化，没有骨膜反应性新生骨。

sentences.english: At the 22th week, atheroma and calcification were present.
sentences.chinese: 实验22周时可见粥样斑块形成及管壁钙化。

sentences.english: Osteoma should be included in the differential diagnosis of calcified masses in cerebellopontine angle.
sentences.chinese: 在小脑桥脑角之钙化肿块，骨瘤必须列入鉴别诊断。

sentences.english: Calcification is the main cause of bioprosthetic heart valve failure.
sentences.chinese: 钙化是生物瓣原发性失功的主要原因。

sentences.english: Calcified the surface of the river bed.
sentences.chinese: 将坡面长期钙化而形成的。

sentences.english: Nodes under the ependyma and nodes in the cortex were characteristic expressions in CT.
sentences.chinese: CT上有室管膜下钙化结节和皮质结节特征性表现。

sentences.english: Note the purplish blue calcifications in the media; note that the lumen is unaffected by this process.
sentences.chinese: 在动脉中膜可见紫蓝色的钙化灶，而管腔没有受累。

sentences.english: It didn't show any evidence of dilating or enlarging or calcifying.
sentences.chinese: 它没有表现出任何扩张或放大或钙化的证据。

sentences.english: Ocean acidification caused by emission of carbon dioxide is particularly detrimental to calcifying organisms.
sentences.chinese: 由于二氧化碳所引起的海洋酸化不利于钙化生物生存。

sentences.english: Note that the two large lobules in the center contain microcalcifications.
sentences.chinese: 值得注意的是中央处两个大的小叶包含了小钙化灶。

sentences.english: Grossly, the tumors are poorly circumscribed, gray-white, and may have flecks of calcification.
sentences.chinese: 大体上，肿瘤边界不清，灰白色，可见钙化点。

sentences.english: That is to say, less and less of the sea will remain hospitable for calcifying organisms.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，适合钙化生物居住的海洋，会越来越少。

sentences.english: Some mummies had calcification in up to 6 different arteries.
sentences.chinese: 有些木乃伊钙化的部位竟多达6处。

sentences.english: Thoracic aortic calcification is associated with an increased risk of death and cardiovascular disease.
sentences.chinese: 胸主动脉钙化与死亡和心血管事件的危险性增加有关。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the experiment work of calcified roast picking-up Vanadium from some mineral.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了某钒矿采用无污染钙化焙烧提钒的试验工作。

definition: growth (of organism)/proliferation/supernumerary candidate (in imperial examation system)
hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
